HOME.aboutdesc: Maktub is one of the leading companies in the field of online trading and marketing. The company was established in 2021 in the State of Qatar, Al Wakra. Our activities are represented in the sale of electronic business cards through our website, which allows customers to choose several forms and impressive designs. Digital business cards are the modern way to share contact information. Digital business cards are also known as virtual and electronic business cards, and they are more interactive, cost-effective, and sustainable than their physical counterparts.
HOME.ourmissdesc: Our mission is to make life easier, and your business grow with our modern service you can buy your comfort.
HOME.ourvisdesc: Our Vision is to be the leading company in Qatar for online trading and marketing and to be known globally.
HOME.cyoo: Would you like to create your own and special Digital Business Card with your company logo? Send us a message and our team will get in touch with you!
